content.prompt: Which of the following was the most important long-term effect of the European acquisition of the wealth and resources of the Americas, as alluded to in the passage?

choices.label: A lasting shift in the balance of trade between Europe and Asia
The decline of feudalism in Europe
A decrease in the influence of Christianity worldwide
The end of Chinese maritime exploration in the Indian Ocean

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
